channel.title: Aerospace Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Aerospace Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End CA-14 North at US-395
item.description: End CA-14 north at US-395. CA-14 starts in Los Angeles, and runs 116 miles to US-395 in Kern County.

item.title: CA-14 North/CA-178 East at CA-178 East
item.description: CA-14 North/CA-178 East at CA-178 East junction. Turn right for CA-178 east to Inyokern, China Lake, and Ridgecrest. CA-178 leaves US-395 here.

item.title: CA-14 North/CA-178 East Approaching CA-178 East
item.description: CA-14 North/CA-178 East approaching CA-178 east. Use CA-178 east for Inyokern, Ridgecrest, and US-395 south. Northbound US-395 traffic continue north on CA-14.

item.title: CA-14 North Approaching CA-178 West
item.description: CA-14 North approaching CA-178 West to Isabella. CA-178 east joins CA-14 north briefly to the Inyokern area.

item.title: CA-14 North at CA-58 West Onramp
item.description: CA-14 North at CA-58 West onramp to Bakersfield.

item.title: CA-14 North at CA-58
item.description: CA-14 north at CA-58 (Exit 167) junction. Turn right for CA-58 East to Barstow; continue over overpass and then left for CA-58 west to Bakersfield.

item.title: CA-14 North at Bus. CA-58 West
item.description: CA-14 North/Bus. CA-58 West split. Turn right for CA-14 north to Bishop. Continue ahead for CA-58 (via Business CA-58) west to Bakersfield.

item.title: CA-14 North/Business CA-58 North Split
item.description: CA-14 North/Business CA-58 North split in Mojave. Turn right for CA-14 north to Bishop and Reno (Nevada). Continue ahead for CA-58 (via Business CA-58) to Bakersfield.

item.title: CA-14 North at Business CA-58
item.description: CA-14 north at Business CA-58 in Mojave. Turn right on Business CA-58 for Barstow; continue north for Bishop and Bakersfield. Business CA-58 joins CA-14 north for a few blocks through Mojave. Up until 2004, CA-58 traffic went through Mojave on the current route of Business CA-58.

item.title: CA-14 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-14 north to Mojave, Bishop, and Reno (Nevada). Taken just north of the Rosamond Blvd. interchange.

item.title: CA-14 North - Mojave/Bishop
item.description: Overhead on CA-14 north to Mojave and Bishop. Taken at the Rosamond Blvd. (Exit 55) interchange.

item.title: CA-138 East at CA-14 North
item.description: CA-138 East at CA-14 North onramp to Mojave.

item.title: CA-138 East at CA-14 South
item.description: CA-138 east at CA-14 south onramp. CA-138 east joins CA-14 south to Palmdale.

item.title: CA-138 East At CA-14
item.description: CA-138 east at CA-14. Merge right for CA-14 South/CA-138 East.

item.title: CA-138 East Approaching CA-14
item.description: CA-138 east approaching CA-14. Use CA-14 north for Mojave; CA-14 south for Los Angeles and Lancaster. CA-138 east joins CA-14 south to Palmdale.

item.title: CA-138 East Approaching CA-14
item.description: CA-138 east approaching CA-14. CA-138 east joins CA-14 south to Palmdale.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 35
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 35 - CA-138 East/Palmdale/Palmdale Blvd. CA-138 west joins CA-14 north through Lancaster. South of this junction, CA-14 is known as the Antelope Valley Freeway. North of this junction CA-14 is known as the Aerospace Highway.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 37
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 37 - 10th St. West.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 40
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 40 - Avenue M.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 41
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 41 - Avenue L.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 42
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 42 - Avenue K.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 43
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 43 - Avenue J.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 44
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 44 - Avenue I.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 45
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 45 - Avenue H.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 46
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 46 - Avenue G.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-138 East - Exit 47
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-138 East at Exit 47 - Avenue F.

item.title: CA-14 South - Antelope Valley Freeway
item.description: CA-14 South (and CA-138 East) - Antelope Valley Freeway.

item.title: CA-14 South - Exit 49
item.description: CA-14 south at Exit 49 - CA-138 West/Avenue D/Gorman. CA-138 east joins CA-14 south to Palmdale.

item.title: CA-14 South - Los Angeles County Line
item.description: Los Angeles County Line on CA-14 south. Los Angeles County is the most populous county in the United States according to the 2010 US Census.

item.title: CA-14 South - Exit 52
item.description: CA-14 south at Exit 52 - Avenue A. Avenue A runs along the county line between Kern and Los Angeles counties.

item.title: CA-14 South - Lancaster/Los Angeles
item.description: CA-14 south to Lancaster and Los Angeles. Posted on the Rosamond Blvd. interchange.

item.title: CA-14 South - Exit 55
item.description: CA-14 south at Exit 55 - Rosamond Blvd.

item.title: CA-14 South - Exit 58
item.description: CA-14 south at Exit 58 - Dawn Road.

item.title: CA-14 South - Exit 61
item.description: CA-14 south at Exit 61 - Backus Road.

item.title: CA-14 South - Exit 64
item.description: CA-14 south at Exit 64 - Silver Queen Road. This is the first interchange on the CA-14 freeway south of Mojave.

item.title: CA-14 South/Bus. CA-58 East at Split
item.description: CA-14 South/Bus. CA-58 East at split on south side of Mojave. Turn left for Bus. CA-58 East To CA-58. Continue ahead for CA-14 south to Los Angeles.

item.title: CA-14 South at Bus. CA-58
item.description: CA-14 south at Bus. CA-58 in Mojave. Turn right for Bus. CA-58 west towards Bakersfield. Turn left to continue south on CA-14 and Bus. CA-58 east towards Los Angeles.

item.title: CA-14 South Approaching Bus. CA-58
item.description: CA-14 South approaching Bus. CA-58. To continue south on CA-14 towards Los Angeles, turn left at intersection.

item.title: CA-14 South at CA-58
item.description: CA-14 south at CA-58. Turn right for CA-58 west to Bakersfield. Continue over overpass and take second right for CA-58 east to Barstow.

item.title: CA-14 South Approaching CA-58
item.description: CA-14 South approaching CA-58 to Barstow (east) and Bakersfield (west).

item.title: CA-14 South - Exit 73
item.description: CA-14 south at Exit 73 - California City Blvd.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-178 West at Split
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-178 West at CA-14/CA-178 split. Turn right for CA-178 west to Weldon and Lake Isabella.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-178 West Approaching CA-178 West
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-178 West approaching CA-178 West. Use CA-178 west for Lake Isabella.

item.title: CA-178 West at CA-14
item.description: CA-178 west at CA-14 near Inyokern. CA-178 joins CA-14 south for the next few miles. Turn left to continue on CA-178.

item.title: CA-178 West Approaching CA-14
item.description: CA-178 west approaching CA-14. Turn right on CA-14 north for Bishop; left on CA-14 South/CA-178 West for Los Angeles. CA-178 west joins CA-14 south for a few miles.

item.title: CA-178 West at Brown Road
item.description: CA-178 west at Brown Road, to US-395 north towards Bishop. Continue west on CA-178 for CA-14 junction.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-14
item.description: US-395 south at CA-14 junction. This is the northern end of CA-14. Use left lanes for US-395 south to San Bernardino. Use right lanes for CA-14 south to Los Angeles.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-14
item.description: US-395 south approaching CA-14. Use left lanes for US-395 south to San Bernardino. Use right lanes for CA-14 south to Los Angeles.
